sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
If it is given that \((18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 ):(cd ) = -9 : 1 \). Find the ratio of \(c : d \).
\newline
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	(18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 ):(cd ) = -9 : 1 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 }{cd } = \frac{-9}{1}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 = -9 cd 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 18 c ^2 - (-9 )cd - 5 d ^2 = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 18 c ^2 + 9cd - 5 d ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 18 c ^2 + 15 cd - 6 cd - 5 d ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 3c (6c + 5d) - 1d (6c + 5d) = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow (6 c + 5 d )(3 c - 1 d ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (6 c + 5 d ) = 0 \text{ or} (3 c - 1 d ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{c }{d } = \frac{-5 }{6 }
\]
Or, 
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{c }{d } = \frac{1 }{3 }
\]
\newline
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{The expression $ (18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 ):(cd ) = -9 : 1 $ can be written as $ frac{18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 }{cd } = \frac{-9}{1} $}.$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon cross_multiplication and simplification we get $ 18 c ^2 - 5 d ^2 = -9 cd $}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Bringing all the terms on the left hand side we get $ 18 c ^2 - (-9 )cd - 5 d ^2 = 0$ which can be written as $18 c ^2 + 9cd - 5 d ^2 = 0$.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{ Upon finding factors the exprssion can be written as $ 18 c ^2 + 15 cd - 6 cd - 5 d ^2 = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking common factors out we get $ (6 c + 5 d )(3 c - 1 d ) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Any factor can be zero, thereforee, $ (6 c + 5 d ) = 0$ or (3 c - 1 d ) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "Upon simplifying the two equalities we get $\frac{c }{d } = \frac{-5 }{6 }$ or $\frac{c }{d } = \frac{1 }{3 }$ "}]
